instruction.value: Suck on lozenge until fully dissolved in mouth.
Upon strong temptation to smoke, suck on lozenge until fully dissolved in mouth.

AdditionalNotes.value: Initial treatment period: Weeks 1 to 6. Recommended a minimum of 8 lozenges per day. 4 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking up.
Step down treatment peroid: Weeks 7 to 9. 4 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking up.
Step down treatment peroid: Weeks 10 to 12. 4 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking up.
